name: Vaar's Adventure 2nd
description:
The 2nd episode of Vaar's Adventure.

Made with : WOLF RPG EDITOR ENGLISH

Game Controls

Move : Direction keys or Numeric keypad 2, 8, 4, 6

Enter : Z key, Enter key, Space key

Cancel : X key, Esc key, Backspace key, Insert key, Numpad 0

Change screen size : F4 key

Reset game : F12 key

Thank you.
